oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unidentified soldier with 1851 Colt Navy pistol

oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Military uniforms
United Stated - History - Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified Confederate soldier in uniform and kepi, holding what appears to be an 1851 Colt Navy Sheriff pistol in his right hand and a knife in his left. The ambrotype is set in a decorative oval frame.
